verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2351>uproar<s%> was <S%G3973>ceased,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> called <S%G4341>unto<s%> him <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G782>embraced<s%> them, and <S%G1831>departed<s%> for to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he had gone <S%G1330>over<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3870>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3056>exhortation,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1671>Greece,<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> there <S%G4160>abode<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%> And <S%G5259>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> laid wait <S%G1917>for<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> as he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4947>Syria,<s%> he <S%G1096>purposed<s%> <S%G1106><s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G4902>accompanied<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G891>into<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G4986>Sopater<s%> of <S%G961>Berea;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians,<s%> <S%G708>Aristarchus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4580>Secundus;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> of <S%G1190>Derbe,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> of <S%G774>Asia,<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5161>Trophimus.<s%>
These <S%G3778><s%> going <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G3306>tarried<s%> for <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> sailed <S%G1602>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G891>in<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2250>days;<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G1304>abode<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3391>first<s%> day of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>week,<s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> came <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G2806>break<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1256>preached<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3195>ready<s%> to <S%G1826>depart<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1887>morrow;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3905>continued<s%> his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3317>midnight.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2985>lights<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> upper <S%G5253>chamber,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> gathered <S%G4863>together.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G2376>window<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2161>Eutychus,<s%> being fallen <S%G2702>into<s%> a <S%G901>deep<s%> <S%G5258>sleep:<s%> and as <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1909>was<s%> <S%G4119>long<s%> <S%G1256>preaching,<s%> he sunk <S%G2702>down<s%> <S%G575>with<s%> <S%G5258>sleep,<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> third <S%G5152>loft,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was taken <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> went <S%G2597>down,<s%> and fell <S%G1968>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4843>embracing<s%> him <S%G2036>said,<s%> Trouble not <S%G2350>yourselves;<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> he therefore was come up <S%G305>again,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G2806>broken<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1089>eaten,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3656>talked<s%> a long <S%G1909>while,<s%> <S%G2425><s%> even <S%G891>till<s%> break of <S%G827>day,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> he <S%G1831>departed.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> young <S%G3816>man<s%> <S%G2198>alive,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3357>little<s%> <S%G3870>comforted.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> went <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and <S%G321>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G789>Assos,<s%> <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> to take <S%G353>in<s%> <S%G3972>Paul:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2258>had<s%> he <S%G1299>appointed,<s%> <S%G3195>minding<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> to go <S%G3978>afoot.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G4820>met<s%> with <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G789>Assos,<s%> we took him <S%G353>in,<s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3412>Mitylene.<s%>

And we sailed <S%G2547>thence,<s%> <S%G636><s%> and <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1966>next<s%> day over <S%G481>against<s%> <S%G5508>Chios;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2087>next<s%> day we <S%G3846>arrived<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G4544>Samos,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>tarried<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5175>Trogyllium;<s%> and <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2192>next<s%> day we <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2919>determined<s%> to sail <S%G3896>by<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G3704>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1096>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> spend the <S%G5551>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G4692>hasted,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1415>possible<s%> for <S%G846>him,<s%> to <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4005>Pentecost.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> and <S%G3333>called<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they were <S%G3854>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5210>Ye<s%> <S%G1987>know,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575>that<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1910>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> after what <S%G4459>manner<s%> I have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> at <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5550>seasons,<s%>

Serving <S%G1398><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> humility of <S%G5012>mind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3986>temptations,<s%> which <S%G4819>befell<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> lying in <S%G1917>wait<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> Jews: <S%G2453><s%>

And <S%G5613>how<s%> I kept <S%G5288>back<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> that was <S%G4851>profitable<s%> unto <S%G3361>you,<s%> but have <S%G312>showed<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1219>publicly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from house to <S%G2596>house,<s%> <S%G3624><s%>

Testifying <S%G1263><s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> also to the <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the things that shall <S%G4876>befall<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>there:<s%> <S%G846><s%>

Save <S%G4133><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1263>witnesseth<s%> in every <S%G2596>city,<s%> <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> none of these things move <S%G4160>me,<s%> <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G2192>count<s%> I <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5093>dear<s%> unto <S%G1683>myself,<s%> so <S%G5613>that<s%> I might <S%G5048>finish<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1408>course<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1248>ministry,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> to <S%G1263>testify<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> no <S%G3765>more.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I take you to <S%G3143>record<s%> <S%G5213><s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> men.
For <S%G1063><s%> I have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5288>shunned<s%> <S%G3361>to<s%> <S%G312>declare<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Take <S%G4337>heed<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> unto <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4168>flock,<s%> <S%G1722>over<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> hath <S%G5087>made<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1985>overseers,<s%> to <S%G4165>feed<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G4046>purchased<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G867>departing<s%> shall <S%G926>grievous<s%> <S%G3074>wolves<s%> enter <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5339>sparing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4168>flock.<s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> your own <S%G5216>selves<s%> <S%G846><s%> shall <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G450>arise,<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> perverse <S%G1294>things,<s%> to draw <S%G645>away<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G1127>watch,<s%> and <S%G3421>remember,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> by the space of three <S%G5148>years<s%> I <S%G3973>ceased<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3560>warn<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1144>tears.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3569>now,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> I <S%G3908>commend<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> which is <S%G1410>able<s%> to build you <S%G2026>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them which are <S%G37>sanctified.<s%>
I have <S%G1937>coveted<s%> no <S%G3762>man's<s%> <S%G694>silver,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5553>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2441>apparel.<s%>

Yea, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>ye<s%> yourselves <S%G1097>know,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> have <S%G5256>ministered<s%> unto <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5532>necessities,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to them that <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

I have <S%G5263>showed<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2872>laboring<s%> ye <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G482>support<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> to <S%G3421>remember<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> <S%G848>he<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> to receive. <S%G2983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> he kneeled <S%G5087>down,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1119><s%> and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they all wept <S%G1096>sore,<s%> <S%G2425><s%> <S%G2805><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G5137>neck,<s%> and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

Sorrowing <S%G3600><s%> most of <S%G3122>all<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2046>spake,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2334>see<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> no <S%G3765>more.<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G4311>accompanied<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship.<s%>
